section.title: Description
section.p: Evaluates the method used in determining the size and dimensions of the tumor

stentry.p: Indicates the Seer Extent of Disease coding schema. Possible values are IN SITU;Tumor confined to lacrimal gland/duct; Invading periosteum of ; fossa of lacrimal gland/duct; Extension to any of the following without bone invasion:Orbital soft tissues, Optic nerve, Globe (eyeball); Adjacent bone; FURTHER contiguous extension; Metastasis; UNKNOWN if extension or metastasis; etc.
